ModMetaData.name: Giddy-up! Battle Mounts
ModMetaData.author: Roolo
ModMetaData.description: Giddy-up! Let your pawns charge into battle with mounts. With this mod, drafted pawns can mount almost any animal that is large enough. Dependencies This mod depends on Giddy-up! Core, and Hugslib. Load order should be: Hugslib -> Giddy-up! Core -> Giddy-up! Battle Mounts
